flavorText:
"We turned to see where the blow came from and saw only a distant light."
—Capashen lord

foreignData.flavorText: „Wir wandten uns um, um die Herkunft des Schlages zu erkunden, doch wir sahen nur ein fernes Leuchten." —Lord der Capashen
foreignData.name: Glimmernder Engel
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
{U}: Der Glimmernde Engel kann in diesem Zug nicht das Ziel von Zaubersprüchen und Fähigkeiten sein.

foreignData.flavorText: « Nous nous tournâmes vers la direction du coup mais ne vîmes qu'un rai de lumière dans le lointain. » — Un seigneur capashen.
foreignData.name: Ange rayonnant
foreignData.text:
Vol
{U}: L'Ange rayonnant ne peut être la cible de sorts ou de capacités ce tour-ci.

name: Glimmering Angel
originalText:
Flying
oo
U Glimmering Angel can't be the target of spells or abilities this turn.

rulings.text: You can activate the ability that grants shroud in response to this card being targeted by a spell or ability. If you do so, then (if this is the spell or abilities only target) the spell or ability won’t resolve since this card will now be an illegal target.

text:
Flying
{U}: Glimmering Angel gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
